Package zipkin.server.internal

Class ZipkinQueryApiV1

  • java.lang.Object
    • zipkin.server.internal.ZipkinQueryApiV1

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1")
@ConditionalOnProperty(name="zipkin.query.enabled",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
public class ZipkinQueryApiV1
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the json api used by the Zipkin UI See com.twitter.zipkin.query.ZipkinQueryController
